com.inrix.sdk.utils

Class AddressLocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inrix.sdk.utils.AddressLocator

  • public class AddressLocator
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts locations between address strings and longitude/latitude pairs (both geocoding and reverse geocoding).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AddressLocator.AddressLocatorCallbackAdapter
      Simple adapter that implements AddressLocator.AddressLocatorListCallback.
      static interface  AddressLocator.AddressLocatorListCallback
      Interface for receiving notifications when asynchronous operations are complete.
      static class  AddressLocator.AddressLocatorResults
      The returned result from a geocoding-related asynchronous operation.
      static class  AddressLocator.AddressLocatorStatusCode
      Result status for geocoding-related asynchronous operations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AddressLocator(android.content.Context context, AddressLocator.AddressLocatorListCallback callback)
      Instantiates a new instance of the {link AddressLocator} class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AddressLocator

        public AddressLocator(android.content.Context context,
              AddressLocator.AddressLocatorListCallback callback)
        Instantiates a new instance of the {link AddressLocator} class.
        Parameters:
        context - Global information about the application's environment.
        callback - Callback that is called when an asynchronous operation is complete.

    • Method Detail

      • getLocation

        public void getLocation(java.lang.String addressStr)
        Asynchronously finds the latitude and longitude of an address string (reverse geocoding). Obtain the latitude and longitude through the AddressLocator.AddressLocatorListCallback object.
        Parameters:
        addressStr - The address as a String.

      • getLocations

        public void getLocations(java.lang.String addressStr,
                int maxResults)
        Asynchronously finds a list of latitude and longitude pairs for an address string (reverse geocoding). Obtain the latitude and longitude through the AddressLocator.AddressLocatorListCallback object.
        Parameters:
        addressStr - The address as a String.
        maxResults - The maximum number of addresses to return.

      • getAddress

        public void getAddress(android.location.Location location)
        Asynchronously finds an address given a physical location (geocoding). Obtain the address string through the AddressLocator.AddressLocatorListCallback object.
        Parameters:
        location - The location, containing latitude and longitude.

      • getAddress

        public void getAddress(GeoPoint geoPoint)
        Asynchronously finds an address given a latitude and longitude (geocoding). Obtain the address string through the AddressLocator.AddressLocatorListCallback object.
        Parameters:
        geoPoint - Latitude / longitude of the geographical location.

      • getAddress

        public void getAddress(double latitude,
              double longitude)
        Asynchronously finds an address given a latitude and longitude (geocoding). Obtain the address string through the AddressLocator.AddressLocatorListCallback object.
        Parameters:
        latitude - The latitude.
        longitude - The longitude.

      • addressAsString

        public static final java.lang.String addressAsString(android.location.Address address)
        Converts address into string.
        Parameters:
        address - Address to convert from.
        Returns:
        Address string.
